column1: starts with a short of length delivery, worked away towards square leg, off the mark straightaway
pitched up, defended towards mid-on
around the wicket, angling in and moving away, thin outside edge and Roach makes an early breakthrough
pitched up at the stump, pushes forward and gets an inside edge towards fine leg, gets off the mark
fuller outside off, moves across before leaving it alone
fuller again, comes forward and gets an outside edge past gully, comes back for the second
fuller on the stumps, Mominul comes forward and pushes it towards mid-on
on the pads and flicked away, first boundary of the Test, the fine leg dives across to his right but couldn't stop it
short of length, just outside off, stays in the crease and blocks, almost 142kph that one from Gabriel
drifting down once again, Mominul looks to work it off his hips, too far away from him
short and wide outside off this time, Mominul gets on the top of the bounce and cuts it past backward point for his second boundary
almost a yorker this time, just around off, jammed towards mid-on
in the corridor from around the wicket, left alone
short of length, a similar line once again, shouldered arms
much straighter this time, on the pads and tucked away towards short midwicket
short of length, slightly outside off, punched off the back foot towards extra cover
a touch fuller and wider, forces it towards point on this occasion
in the corridor, wide outside off, bounces once again before reaching the wicketkeeper as Mominul leaves it alone
fuller outside off, punched towards extra cover
back of length this time, just outside off, pushed on the off side
a touch fuller and just around off, 143 kph, almost squares Mominul off as he defends it on the off side
short, angling in towards the rib cage, Mominul goes back and rolls it wrists over it to find another boundary to fine leg
pitched up this time, on the stumps, Mominul punch it past mid-on, who chases it to save one run for his side
down the leg side this time, Imrul looks to flick but misses, the ball brushes his pads on the way to Dowrich
a touch fuller outside off, Mominul comes forward to drive, mistimes it towards to extra cover
a touch shorter this time, transfers his weight back and looks to punch, too close to the body though, chopped towards point
an inside edge this time, goes through the batsman's pads, lucky for Mominul there as he gets to the other end with a single
dropped by Chase at second slip, a thick healthy edge to a length ball as Imrul pushes at it, was a regulation catch but grassed
this one comes back in after pitching, Imrul was looking to punch it through covers, gets beaten. Once again on the second bounce to the keeper
in the corridor, length outside off and left alone
fuller, angling across the left-hander, pushed back towards the bowler
back of length this time, rising and angling, Mominul stays inside and punches it towards covers
goes for the bouncer, but it's down the leg side and pulled away towards fine leg, but guess what, Gabriel has overstepped
length ball, coming in with the angle, Imrul stays back and defends
fuller outside off, Imrul squeezes it towards gully region
aiming for the yorker once again, fuller on the stumps, punched towards mid-on
fuller and angling in, tucked away towards midwicket
length ball, around off, punched off the back foot towards covers
a touch fuller and wider, comes forward before leaving it alone
a touch fuller and driven but couldn't beat the man at cover once again
length, in the corridor, Mominul moves across before shouldering arms
a similar line and length this time, comes forward and leaves it alone once more
a touch fuller this time, pushes it gently towards the right of the cover fielder and takes a quick single
length outside off, stays in his crease and steers it towards point
another no-ball, on the pads as well and tucked away for a single
length ball from around the wicket, Imrul once again pushes at it and gets a thick outside edge, on the bounce to third slip

a touch fuller, just outside off, Imrul presents the full face of the bat and drives it past mid-off, the fielder gives chases and pulls it just inside but doesn't matter as the batsmen run four themselves
driven firmly once again, this time towards short extra cover, was in the air for a while but well short of the fielder
in the rib cage this time, trying to mix-it up Gabriel, Imrul fends at it and gets a leg-bye to short fine leg
length, in the corridor and Mominul has been very watchful of those, lets it go once again
length around off, comes forward and blocks
back of length this time, Imrul stays in his crease and defends down the wicket
short and wide and looks to smash it on the up, mistimes it to covers
a touch fuller and on the stumps, the ball hits the inner half of the bat and rolls towards fine leg as Imrul looks to defend
driven beautifully, gets down on one knee and extends his arms, the outfield is a tad slow, so he would get only a couple of runs for his effort
a touch shorter this time, Mominul looks to defend it on the off side, gets a thick inside edge on the shoe
short of length, in the rib cage, Imrul jumps in the air and works it towards fine leg
back of length outside off, works it towards point
fuller and driven through covers, a couple of runs more for Mominul in that region
fuller on the pads this time, tucked away behind square to get on the other end
short of length, angling in and tucked away past that man in the helmet, who is more closer to backward square leg and short leg. Once again some exchange of words between Gabriel and Imrul
just outside off and fuller to Mominul who comes forward and defends it towards covers
fuller and wider and Imrul chases it, throws his bat at it and gets lucky. The ball hits the outside edge and flies races towards the third-man boundary, was in the air for a fair bit
length this time, just outside off, comes forward and defends
length again, just outside off, defended on the front foot once again
angling on the pads from a length this occasion, glanced towards fine leg
fuller outside off, driven on the front foot but not much power and timing behind it, mid-off moves across to his left to cut it off
slower one this time short outside off, almost a forehand by Mominul for a single towards midwicket
full on off stump, defended down the pitch
full on leg stump, flicked to deep square
length and some turn away from off stump, defended to short third off the outside half
length on leg stump, nudged to deep square off the back foot
length at leg stump, defended off the inside half
tossed up outside off, driven to short extra
length at leg stump, flicked to short fine leg on the front foot
he's holed out to deep square but Warrican has overstepped! Below-average cricket all around. Length at off stump and Kayes takes him on with a slog sweep and finds deep square. Poor option
length at off stump, defended off the back foot
length at off stump, defended off the back foot
length ball pushed through flat, turning in sharply at middle stump. Tapped to midwicket off the back foot
length at leg stump, defended off the back foot
length outside off, defended down the pitch
short and wide outside off, rides the turn and places this cut shot past backward point. Good hands
past the outside edge. Big turn. Length outside off and it rips a long way past as he looks to defend
length at middle stump, defended on the front foot
length outside off, defended into the covers
length outside off, defended off the back foot
full outside off, driven with the turn to cover
length ball turning down leg side. Stays deep in the crease and tickles it fine

short of a length at a leg stump line and spinning a long way down again. It spins past the keeper and runs away past short fine. They come back for a quick second and he makes it with a dive, third umpire confirms
full toss on middle stump, plants the front leg across and plays the reverse sweep to find the backward point boundary
length ball climbing at leg stump, looks to glance and it finds leg slip on the bounce
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
full on middle stump, defended on the front foot
short at off stump, gets deep in the crease and pulls aerially through midwicket. Off the low end of the bat, but he had the placement right
length on middle stump, defended off the back foot
gorgeous. Length at middle stump. Steps out to meet it at the pitch and lofts it over mid-on with the full face
length at the stumps, defended from deep in the crease
length at leg stump, turned into the leg side
short and wide outside off, rocks back and chops it away through point. Mominul is right on top of this attack at the moment
short of a length on leg stump, glanced to short fine
length at off stump, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, dead-batted off the front foot
length at leg stump, flicked to short fine
length in the corridor, defended off the back foot
full on middle stump, pulls out the reverse sweep again and finds backward point
inside edge as he plays for the turn. This comes back in with the arm and rolls away into the short fine region
tossed up at off stump, driven to extra cover
length outside off, jabs at it with hard hands to defend on the front foot
length at off stump, driven back to the bowler
tossed up wide outside off, toe-ended drive to extra cover
length outside off, hurriedly drives to long-off on the up
length and turning in at off stump, defended off the back foot
length ball at leg stump, ripping further down. Dowrich gets across and stops with his leg
length at leg stump, gets under it and sweeps uppishly over short fine. That was climbing down leg and he used the steepness to get it over
length at leg stump, tapped to short midwicket
length at leg stump, nudged to short fine off the pad
length at off stump, driven to mid-off
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
full and in at off stump. Gets forward to defend and gets an inside edge onto pad
full outside off, driven to short extra cover
length at off stump, defended off the inside half of the bat
length at off stump, steers it to point's right with the turn
full on off stump, driven to mid-off with the turn
length at middle, rides the turn and bounce and steers to short fine
length at middle, plays inside the line but this skids on and takes the outside half of the bat to run past first slip
length at middle stump, flicked to short fine with the turn
length outside off, steps out and jabs it down the pitch
length outside off, gets forward to flick, cops it on the pad
length at off stump, defended off the back foot
length outside off, steps out and bat-pads it into the off side
short of a length outside off, hurriedly chopped to point
tossed up outside off, driven with the turn of sweeper cover
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
full on off stump, defended on the front foot
full outside off, dabbed into the covers with soft hands
full at middle stump, defended into the leg side
fielded at short midwicket with a dive. Hetmyer lunges to his left as the batsman steps out and slugs this from outside off with the turn
length at middle, defended off the back foot
length outside off, steps out and drives to long-on
length outside off, climbs on him and gets him on the body as he looks to defend on the front foot
full outside off, jammed down to long-off
full outside off, driven to long-off
tossed up outside off, gets to the pitch and jabs with the turn to get a single to long-off's right. That brings up his fifty and he makes big runs when he gets fifty on this ground
length outside off, driven to long-off
length at off stump, defended on the front foot
full on off stump, defended on the front foot
tossed up outside off, steps out and flicks to long-on
full at leg stump, gets across and sweeps to the backward square boundary. Once again, didn't try to keep that down
short of a length outside off, turning back in towards off stump. Inside edge onto pad as he looks to cut this
length at middle stump, poked in front of short fine off the back foot
length on off stump, defended off the inside half of the bat
short of a length at leg stump, whipped to short fine off the back foot
length outside off, gets back and flicks to deep square
dropped short and turning in at middle stump. Pulls uppishly to deep midwicket
short and in at off stump. Backs away and chops to sweeper cover
length outside off, tapped through cover off the back foot
length at leg stump, defended off the back foot
dropped very short outside off, punched to sweeper cover
nicely placed. Length ball outside off, reverse-whips this to deep point's right and that is hundred for the pair
length at leg stump, tapped to short midwicket's right
length and wide outside off, looks to sweep and cops it on the back thigh outside the line
short at middle stump, gets deep in the crease and hammers this in front of square with a pull

taps it straight to short leg! Oh that is soft. Loses focus with minutes left for lunch. He's been somewhat careless with the leg glance all morning, often going with hard hands, and that is what he's done again. Short of a length ball, keeps low at leg stump. He gets deep in the crease and pushes from in front of the body and it's like catching practice. Was on top of the bounce but didn't roll the wrists, and he's given it away just when he'd started to look good
length ball on the stumps, defended on the back foot
starts with a fuller one around off, punched back towards the bowler
back of length this time, around fourth stump, defended back once again
full and wide and Mominul leans into it, was in the air but through the gap, the backward-point fielder cuts it off
pitched-up once again but this time on the off stump, punched firmly but couldn't get past mid-on
back of length, once again mixing it up, blocked on the off side
a high full-toss outside off, Mominul steers it towards deep backward point once again but straight towards the fielder this time
short of length outside off, Mithun goes for the cut, mistimes it into the ground
fuller around off, driven firmly but straight to extra cover
much slower in the air this time, stays in the crease and defends
fuller and pushed to the left of the mid-off, sets off as soon as he hits it and gets off the mark with a quick single
full and wide and Mominul finds the boundary this time, reaches out for it and steers it through covers
flighted outside off, comes forward and smothers it
fuller outside off, Mithun looks to smash it through covers, was nowhere near the pitch of the ball, inside edge into the ground
a touch fuller and much closer to the stumps, keeps coming in with the angle, left alone
length again, sixth stump line and shouldered arms once more
a yorker, just outside off, Mithun jams his bat at it and squeezes it out towards covers
fuller again, punched on the front foot, full face of the bat but couldn't beat the extra-cover fielder
fuller again, just outside off. Mithun comes forward and defends
length ball, just outside off, defended from the crease
short of length this time, spinning back into Mominul who helps it towards square leg
struck and struck hard. Takes his front leg out and smashes it down the ground, on the left of the bowler for his first boundary
looks to go hard again, slaps this length ball towards extra cover, didn't get the timing right this time
slower in the air, around middle and leg, defended
looks it paddle it from outside off, but it was too full and spun away, kept a little low as well, no connection with the willow there
length ball from around the wicket, gets behind the line of the ball and blocks
back of length outside off, Mominul stays inside the line and soft-hands it towards point for an easy single, the cover fielder cuts it off as backward point is near the boundary
bouncer but doesn't bounce that much, Mithun takes his eyes off as he looks to duck, gets hit on the biceps
another short one, Mithun was ready for it and goes for the pull. However, ends up under-edging it on to the left leg, makes a gesture that it came slower off the surface
another short delivery, just outside off, Mithun rides on his toes and defends it into the ground
length, in the corridor and shouldered arms this time
tossed up outside off, Mominul looks to drive through covers, a bit of turn means the ball goes towards leg side off the inner half
a touch wider this time, pushes again, the ball rolls towards backward point
down the track but beaten in the flight, gets an inside edge on the body
use of feet once again, looks to work it down the ground but the ball goes towards square leg
driven along the ground towards long-off for another single
short of length outside off, goes back and punches it towards extra cover
fuller, tailing in a bit as Mithun looks to drive through off side, gets an inside edge on the pads
short but way down the leg side, Mithun is not bothered at all
short of length outside off, pushed the batsman back again, dabbed towards cover-point
another short one, but doesn't rise much, Mithun gets on the top of the bounce and drops it on the leg side
length outside off, sixth stump line and left alone
angled in from wide off the crease, fuller outside off and defended, a four-minute-40-second over, they say on the TV
length ball, on the stumps, Mominul goes back and punches it towards extra cover
length ball, on the pads, tucked away towards square leg for a single
short of length on middle and leg, Mithun rocks back and pulls it towards deep midwicket for a boundary, gives it the treatment it deserved
an outside edge but rolls past first slip, was fuller on middle and leg, Mithun pushes forward but the ball spins away to take the outside edge
some slow turn once again but it was too short, Mithun was early into the shot, ends up chipping it towards long-on
dropped, another chance goes down, it was a touch fuller outside off, Mominul pushes at it but Dowrich couldn't latch on to
fuller and outside off, 132 kph, punches it towards extra covers
on the pads this time, tucked away behind square leg but only a single
pitched up outside off, Mominul comes forward and drives it towards mid-off
short of length outside off, punched off the back foot towards extra cover
length, outside off, Mominul for a change was stuck in the crease and pushes at it, and defends it away from the body
fuller outside off, comes on the front foot but mistimes the drive to mid-off
length ball, pitching around middle and leg, a little bit of turn, pushed down the wicket
fuller on the stumps this time, deafened back towards the bowler
pitched up once again, on the leg stump, tucked away towards square leg
short and wide and Mithun cuts it away, there is sweeper cover in place
short of length once again, punched off the back foot towards extra cover
length, just outside off, Mithun stays back and cuts it straight towards point
short and pulled away towards deep square leg, Mominul fully in control of the shot there
a bit of yes-no but safe in the end, Mithun was looking to steal a quick single but soon realises there isn't one and gets back in time, was a length ball which he dabbed towards point
a touch fuller on the pads this time, flicked away towards deep square leg
length outside off this time, Mominul comes forward before letting it go
short of length outside off, pushed towards point on the front foot
length ball, on the pads and tucked away in front of square, comes back for the second
length ball around 82 kph, just around off and middle, defended
tossed up this time, on middle and leg, defended inside out towards the bowler
looks to go big this time but mistimes it towards short midwicket, was given air once again, Mithun wasn't near the pitch and threw his hands at it, ends up dragging it on the leg side
slower again, on the stumps, Mominul is happy to defend it
short of length and pulled away but there is protection on the deep
once again dropped a touch shorter, Mithun punches it towards extra cover off the back foot
length from around the wicket, goes for the cut but misses
pushed towards long-on this time, a walking single there
short in length this time, Mominul goes back and punches it towards extra cover
length, just outside off, Mithun hangs hit bat outside off, a thick outside edge towards backward point
fuller around off and middle, Mominul uses his feet and works it towards midwicket, all along the ground
fuller outside off, smothered on the front foot
short of length, goes back and flicks it towards backward square leg
down the track, doesn't reach the pitch of the ball, ends up padding it away
short and cuts it away, gets another brace before sweeper cover cuts it off
a touch fuller and wider, dabbed behind the wicket, first slip cuts it off
tossed up this time on middle and leg, Mominul was looking to work it through midwicket, ends up flicking it behind square
beauty! Pitching around middle and leg and spinning away to beat the bat as Mithun looks to defend
tossed up around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller on the stumps, pushed back towards the bowler

was in the air but goes past the diving short midwicket fielder on his right, Hetmyer uses his football skills to stop it just in front of the boundary, it was tossed up around off and middle, Mominul wasn't close to the pitch but went through it
short of length outside off this time, punches it towards sweeper cover
length ball, spinning back in to the batsman, turns it away on the leg side
length around off and middle and spins down the leg side, tucked away behind square for a couple
short of a length just outside off, cut to backward point
nearly chops it on. Length ball drifts in sharply and zips away as he goes deep in the crease to defend on the back foot. Follows with his hands and gets an inside edge

slogs across the line and is caught by the keeper pitch side on the off side. He's lost all composure. Bishoo with the vicious drift in again. This time the ball is fuller and turning away from leg stump. He's trying to clear midwicket and has lost his shape completely
length and spinning in at middle stump. Goes back and punches to long-on
full on leg stump, leans into this and flicks to deep backward square's left
short outside off, spinning back in. Chopped to deep point's left
length outside off, blocked on the front foot with the turn
full toss outside off, driven to sweeper cover
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
full outside off, leans in and flicks to short leg
short of a length and in at off stump, tapped into the covers
short of a length outside off, sliced to deep point
full and wide outside off. Leans in and opens the face to run it past slip
length at middle stump, punched to long-on
tossed up wide outside off, meets it at the pitch and drives it wide of mid-off
length at off stump, tapped to extra cover with the turn
length ball in at off stump, defended off the back foot
length at leg stump, defended into the pitch
length at off stump, driven back down the pitch
full outside off, jammed down to long-off
rapped on the pad as he goes back to a fullish delivery. That spun back in sharply but was probably going down. Lbw appeal is denied
length on middle and leg, looks to flick, rapped on the pad again
short of a length on leg stump, flicked to deep backward square

another big lbw appeal. It is turned down too. They won't review. Length ball turning in sharply from outside off. He got big stride in trying to defend this. Was he struck outside off? Bishoo causing problems as soon as he switches from around the wicket. Replays show there was an inside edge on it.
length ball skidding straight on, defended off the back foot
length on off, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, chopped to point off the back foot
length outside off, punched to cover point on the up
length ball turning away from off, flicked to deep square off the back foot
full on off stump, tapped to cover with the turn
full outside off, driven to cover's left
full on middle stump, flicked to deep square's right and he picks up three to get into the nineties

inside edge past short leg. Bishoo causing serious problems with this angle. Getting a lot of turn and bounce as Mominul pokes with hard hands on the front foot. It pings off his pad and trickles to square leg
length at off stump, steps out and flicks to midwicket
length ball turning in at leg stump. Rapped on the pad as he looks to glance it fine
length at off stump, ramps it out to long leg off the front foot
short of a length on leg stump, whipped to backward square leg
clears midwicket. Excellent from Mominul. Seizes control in the battle again. Gets down the track and doesn't allow it to turn. Meets it at the pitch and drills it
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, driven to long-off with the turn

slashes past point for the hundred! Short and wide from Chase and Mominul merely uses the pace to get it between point and cover. That's his third consecutive Test hundred at the venue. And his eighth in Tests, which means he equals Tamim for most hundreds by a Bangladesh batsman. What a player, what class today.
length at off, dead-batted into the pitch
full on off stump, driven to long-off
length on off stump, tapped into the covers
steers it fine. Roach bangs it in from around the wicket. Mominul gets behind the line and uses the pace and angle to tickle it off the hips
length outside off, defended off the back foot
length on leg stump, leans into it and flicks to deep square's right
length and in at off stump, defended off the back foot
full and in at middle stump, met on the up and drilled between stumps and non-striker. Slightly off the inside half, but there's enough on it
glorious! Shakib with a sizzling drive. This shapes in from outside off, on a good length. He plants half a stride forward and punches it wide of mid-off
tossed up at off stump, driven to mid-off
full on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length at leg stump, gets deep in the crease and nudges it late to get it fine
length at leg stump, gets back in the crease again and tickles it through square leg off the back foot
full outside off, tapped to extra cover's right
length at leg stump, defended off the back foot
length at leg stump, flicked to deep square off the back foot
length at off stump, defneded off the back foot
length and speared in at off from wide of the crease. Hurriedly gets back and low to defend this

his hips don't lie. Shakib will do anything to protect his wicket! Short ball coming into the corridor, chops it into the pitch and theres danger of it bouncing back onto the stumps. So he gets in between and puts in a jig to get this away from the stumps via his backside
length outside off, chopped into the covers
length at leg stump, flicked to square leg
length on leg stump, flicked to square leg
full at the stumps, defended down the pitch
full on leg stump, flicked with the turn to deep midwicket
short of a length on leg stump, flicked to short fine's right
full outside off, driven to mid-off
length at off stump, defended off the back foot
length outside off, tapped on the up to extra cover
length outside off, driven on the up towards mid-off
length on middle stump, pushed down the pitch on the up
overpitched outside off, forward stride as he drives to mid-off
length and down leg side. Looks to flick this and gets it to the keeper via thigh guard
length outside off, tapped to extra cover on the up
length at middle stump, defended off the back foot
length at off stump, defended off the back foot
short and just outside off. Chops late to get it to deep point's right
length outside off, sliced through the point region
length and in at leg stump, flicked to deep square
length and in at leg stump, flicked through square leg off the back foot
short of a length on leg stump, punched to deep midwicket's right
length at off stump, driven to long-off
big turn. Mominul gets back to defend off stump and this rips away outside off. He's squared up
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
past the outside edge again. Length at off stump, big turn away again. Too much turn
full on leg stump, flicked to deep square
length outside off, tapped pitch side on the off side with soft hands
short ball angled into the corridor. Arches and drops the bat to let this fly by
bouncer slanted down leg side. Parries it to fine leg's left with the hook
short ball down leg side, left alone
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
full on off stump, pushed down the pitch on the up
bowled flat with the arm, was a touch fuller, caught Shakib on the back foot, who does well to get his bat down
fuller again and driven through covers this time
another drive through that region, this time by Mominul, easy single
slower this time, at 83 kph, but way outside off, left alone
dropped short, Shakib gets a thick outside edge as he looks to punch it through covers, takes a single to short third man
pitched up and driven towards long-on off the front foot, another single
caressed through cover-point region, it was a tad fuller outside off and Mominul leans into it, gets a couple of runs
length outside off from around the stumps, left alone

and gone! Gabriel gets his first wicket, it was a length ball outside off, Mominul flashes at it, away from the body, no feet movement whatsoever, gets an outside edge and Dowrich does the rest. A loose shot overall by a set batsman
a juicy full-toss outside off, a welcome gift of sorts and Mushfiqur accepts it gleefully. Drives it through point for four and gets off the mark
short of length outside off, Mushfiqur stays behind the line and defends it towards covers

length ball, coming in to the batsman after pitching, Mushfiqur was looking to force it on the off side, gets beaten is rapped on the pads. A huge lbw appeal denied but West Indies have reviewed. The bat hits the pad as the ball sneaks past, and that's plumb, would have crashed into middle and leg and that's gone
arm ball from round the wicket, Shakib goes back and blocks
keeps a tad low this time, length outside off and Shakib gets a bottom edge as he goes back to defend
short of length outside off, cuts it towards point
fuller on the stumps, and driven towards long-on for one
fuller outside off, pushed towards cover
down the track and chips it towards long-on, was in the air for a while but the fielder is deep
length ball, on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
short and wide this time, driven past point for a couple of runs
a bouncer this time, Mahmudullah ducks under it, no problems for him
a full toss down the leg side, Mahmudullah misses the flick, a good take by Dowrich, diving to his left

bowled 'im! What a spell he's in. This one comes back in sharply after pitching, Mahmudullah looks to defend but it sneaks through between bat and pad, brushing the pad on its way before crashing into the stump
length ball, once again coming back after landing, Mehidy looks to defend, the ball hits the inner half and rolls towards short midwicket
length ball, goes back and punches it towards extra cover
a touch fuller this time, stays in his crease and pushes it towards covers
short of length, another backfoot punch towards covers
a touch fuller this time, leans into it and pushes it on the off side
back of length outside off, goes back and punches it towards long-off
length ball, comes forward and blocks
length ball outside off, driven on the up, the cover fielder makes a partial stop but the batsmen collect two
angling into the batsman this time, on the pads, tucked away towards square leg, Mehidy was looking for the second but was rightly sent back by his partner
length ball, on the pads once again, worked away fine leg
short of length, didn't bounce that much as Shakib blocks it from the crease

fourth wicket for Gabriel! Suddenly, Bangladesh are in danger of getting bowled out under 275. Was a length ball from around the wicket, Shakib looked to punch it on the up, got an inside edge that disturbed the bails on its way
length ball just outside off, defended from the crease
